Capabilities.description: This is the schema definition for Oem Lenovo extended Power resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

LocalPowerControlEnabled.description: This indicates whether local power control is enabled.
LocalPowerControlEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether local power control is enabled.

PowerOnPermissionEnabled.description: This indicates whether power on permission is enabled.
PowerOnPermissionEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether power on permission is enabled.

PowerRestorePolicy.description: This indicates current power policy of the system.
PowerRestorePolicy.longDescription: The power policy specifies that the system's power behavior after AC returns.

RandomDelay.description: This indicates whether random delay before power on.
RandomDelay.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether there is a random delay between 1 and 15 seconds for power on.

WakeOnLANEnabled.description: This indicates whether Wake on LAN is enabled.
WakeOnLANEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether Wake on LAN is enabled.

LenovoPowerControl.description: This is the schema definition for Oem Lenovo extended Power control resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

HistoryPowerMetric.description: A reference indicating power history metric values.
HistoryPowerMetric.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference indicating power history metric values. In this reference shall contain: SystemInputPower, SystemOutputPower, CPUSubsystemPower, MemorySubsystemPower, CoolingSubsystemPower metric values.

PowerUtilization.description: Represents the ability of a platform or component to perform autonomic management of its power utilization.
PowerUtilization.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the ability of a platform or component to perform autonomic management of its power utilization.

LenovoPowerSupply.description: This is the schema definition for Oem Lenovo extended Power supply resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

FruPartNumber.longDescription: The value of this porperty shall be the fru part number.

HistoryPowerSupplyMetric.description: A reference indicating power supply history metric values.
HistoryPowerSupplyMetric.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference indicating power supply history metric values. In this reference shall contain: PowerSupplyInputPower, PowerSupplyOutputPower metric values.

Location.description: The slot info of this PSU.
Location.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate PSU slot information. The InfoFormat shall be Slot X, like Slot 1.

enumDescriptions.AlwaysOff: system stays powered off after AC/mains returns
enumDescriptions.AlwaysOn: system always powers on after AC/mains returns
enumDescriptions.Restore: after AC returns, power is restored to the state that was in effect when AC/mains was lost

PowerUtilization.description: This is the schema definition for Oem Lenovo extended Power Utilization resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CapacityMaxAC.description: CapacityMinAC indicates the maximum value of capacity AC is allowed by the service.
CapacityMaxAC.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the maximum value of capacity AC is allowed by the service.

CapacityMaxDC.description: CapacityMinAC indicates the maximum value of capacity DC is allowed by the service.
CapacityMaxDC.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the maximum value of capacity DC is allowed by the service.

CapacityMinAC.description: CapacityMinAC indicates the minimum value of capacity AC is allowed by the service.
CapacityMinAC.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the minimum value of capacity AC is allowed by the service.

CapacityMinDC.description: CapacityMinAC indicates the minimum value of capacity DC is allowed by the service.
CapacityMinDC.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the minimum value of capacity DC is allowed by the service.

EnablePowerCapping.description: EnablePowerCapping indicates current power capping is enabled or not.
EnablePowerCapping.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the current power capping is enabled or not.

GuaranteedInWatts.description: GuaranteedInWatts indicate the guaranteed value of power limit is allowed by the service.
GuaranteedInWatts.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the guaranteed value of power limit is allowed by the service.

LimitMode.description: LimitMode indicates the current power limit mode implemented by the service.
LimitMode.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the current power limit mode implemented by the service.

MaxLimitInWatts.description: MaxLimitInWatts indicates the maximal value of power limit is allowed by the service.
MaxLimitInWatts.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the maximal value of power limit is allowed by the service.

MinLimitInWatts.description: MinLimitInWatts indicates the minimum value of power limit is allowed by the service.
MinLimitInWatts.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the minimum value of power limit is allowed by the service.

UtilizationMode.description: UtilizationMode indicates the current power utilization mode implemented by the service.
UtilizationMode.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the current power utilization mode implemented by the service.

title: #LenovoPower.v1_0_0
